title: Update package for Microsoft Office 2010 SP2 x86 - November 2015
description:
****************************************************************
Update package for Microsoft Office 2010 SP2 x86 - November 2015
****************************************************************

The Update Package allows a silent install of Microsoft Office 2010 updates without the need for an internet connexion.

Features

- Silent update of an installed Office suite
- Extraction of MSP files to update an installation folder for later integration with an installation distribution

The package include all updates (language neutral) released by November 10, 2015 and applies to any version of Office 2010 Suite (x86).

Update list for Microsoft Office 2010 (november 2015)

Definition Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3101540)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3085560)
Security Update for Microsoft InfoPath 2010 (KB2878230)
Security Update for Microsoft Publisher 2010 (KB2817478)
Security Update for Microsoft Word 2010 (KB2965313)
Security Update for Microsoft Access 2010 (KB3101544)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB3101521)
Security Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2899516)
Security Update for Microsoft Visio 2010 (KB3101526)
Security Update for Microsoft Excel 2010 (KB3101543)
Security Update for Microsoft PowerPoint 2010 (KB3085594)
Security Update for Microsoft OneNote 2010 (KB3054978)
Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2791057)
Update for Microsoft Office 2010 (KB2837592)
Update for Microsoft Outlook 2010 (KB3101535)

Usage

- In both cases make sure that the installed version (or installation media) of Office Suite is already updated to October 2015 level

1. Silent update of an installed Office suite
---------------------------------------------

- Download the Update pack
- Unzip and run batch file 'xxx.xx Update Office Installed'

2. Extract MSP files to update an installation folder
-----------------------------------------------------

- Unzip and run batch file 'xxx.xx Extract MSP files' (as admin on Vista or greater)
- The batch file creates a subfolder 'Extracted' within the same folder, and extracts all MSP update files in it
- Update your installation manually (copy all MSP files to the updates folder) or use included Microsoft Toolkit
